actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Foreign Relations, S. Rept. 94-17.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-312.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Foreign Relations for a study of matters pertaining to the foreign policy of the United States.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-312) Authorizes the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations to expend an amount not to exceed $1,083,300 from March 1, 1975, through February 29, 1976. Directs the Committee to report findings and any recommendations for legislation to the Senate no later than February 29, 1976.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Foreign Relations for a study of matters pertaining to the foreign policy of the United States.
